newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore Aug retail sales fall 4.0 percent on yr.
newsitem.headline: Singapore Aug retail sales fall 4.0 percent on yr.

text.p: Singapore's August retail sales index (base 1991) fell 4.0 percent compared to a year ago, the Department of Statistics said on Sunday.
The index fell 5.4 percent from July 1996.
Excluding motor vehicles, the index registered a month-on-month fall of 7.1 percent in August.
August retail sales were estimated at Singapore $1.88 billion. The statistics department said that year-on-year, in constant prices, the retail index fell by 2.6 percent.
